en_question:
A subsidiary of Tiantian Food Company produces two types of pastries, Product I and Product II, using raw materials A and B. The amount of raw material (in kg) consumed per thousand boxes of each product, the monthly supply of materials, the unit price of materials, and the wholesale price of the two products (in thousand yuan per thousand boxes) are shown in Table C-5.  

  Table C-5  

  \begin{table}[h]
  \centering
  \caption{Table C-5}
  \begin{tabular}{cccccc}
  \toprule
  \multicolumn{2}{c}{\textbf{Product}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{I}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{II}} & \textbf{Monthly Supply (t)} & \textbf{Price (thousand yuan/t)} \\
  \cmidrule(lr){1-2} \cmidrule(lr){5-6}
  \textbf{Raw Material} & & & & & \\
  \midrule
  A & & 1 & 2 & 6 & 9.9 \\
  B & & 2 & 1 & 8 & 6.6 \\
  \midrule
  \multicolumn{2}{c}{\textbf{Wholesale Price}} & 30 & 20 & & \\
  \bottomrule
  \end{tabular}
  \end{table}

  According to market estimates: The monthly sales of Product II do not exceed 2 thousand boxes. The sales volume of Product II does not exceed that of Product I by more than 1 thousand boxes. Task: Calculate the maximum possible wholesale revenue under the given constraints.
cn_question:
甜甜食品公司下属的一个食品厂生产两种点心I和Ⅱ，采用原料A和B。已知生产每盒产品I和Ⅱ时消耗的原料 $\mathbf{kg}$ 数，原料月供应量、原料单价及两种点心的批发价（千元/千盒)如表C-5所示。  

  表C-5  

  \begin{table}[h]
  \centering
  \caption{Table C-5}
  \begin{tabular}{cccccc}
  \toprule
  \multicolumn{2}{c}{\textbf{产品}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{I}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{II}} & \textbf{月供应量/t} & \textbf{单价(千元/t)} \\
  \cmidrule(lr){1-2} \cmidrule(lr){5-6}
  \textbf{原料} & & & & & \\
  \midrule
  A & & 1 & 2 & 6 & 9.9 \\
  B & & 2 & 1 & 8 & 6.6 \\
  \midrule
  \multicolumn{2}{c}{\textbf{批发价}} & 30 & 20 & & \\
  \bottomrule
  \end{tabular}
  \end{table}

  据对市场估计，产品Ⅱ月销量不超过2千盒，产品Ⅱ销量不会超过产品I 1千盒以上。  要求计算最大批发收入
